content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted various commands with empty arguments, all of which returned errors. The list_files command with an empty directory argument returned a list of files in the directory. Command append_to_file and replace_in_file both returned errors when given a directory filename argument. Command execute_shell returned an error: This Shell Command is not allowed. Command google returned an error: Request contains an invalid argument. The read_file, write_to_file, and execute_python_code commands all returned errors when given empty filename or code arguments. Command append_to_file with empty filename and text argument returned an error. Command replace_in_file with empty filename, old_text, new_text, and occurrence_index argument returned an error. Command execute_shell with an empty command_line argument returned an error. Command google with an empty query argument returned an error. Command list_files returned a list of files in the directory. Command execute_python_code with an empty code and basename argument "my_code" returned an error. Command append_to_file returned an error: [Errno 21] Is a directory. Command replace_in_file returned an error: [Errno 21] Is a directory.
"""
